title: Leavebuster Bug
body: I've been in queue for 60 minutes to be exact i've been in 3 LPQ that is 20 minutes long. And after reaching 20 minutes it started reconnecting and canceled my queue so I have to start over again. Tbh the reason of my AFK's were not about my performance in games but; connections specially brownouts. When will the devs will fix this bug?

replies.body: The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system's lower priority queue helps troubleshoot while waiting to queue, but is also really good at catching what otherwise could have been another leave.  I highly recommend working towards resolving whatever is causing these disconnections or brownouts as you put it.  The steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help, but I recommend sticking to custom games to test it out.
